saao/saa15/P334847
a-na {LU₂}EN.NAM be-li₂-ia ARAD-ka {1}{d}PA-BAD₃-PAB lu-u DI-mu a-na be-li₂-ia DI-mu a-na {URU}de-ri DI-mu a-na {URU}HAL.ṢU {1}x x x x x x ša i-si-šu i-sap-ru-u-ni ma-a LUGAL {KUR}NIM.MA{KI} e-mu-qi i-da-ak-ki ma-a x x x x x-ni ina UGU tah-u₂-me x x x x x x-tu mu-ṣu A-MEŠ bat-x x x x x x x i-si-šu ma-a an-nu-rig x x x x x x-riq-an-ni-ni ma-a a-x x x x x x ma-a a-lik a-na be-li₂-ka u₂-ṣur ma-a x x x {LU₂}ARAD-ka a-na-ku ma-a {LU₂}ARAD ša x x x x x+x i-sa-hu-ra ib-E₂ ib-E₂ x x x x x-ma-ra ma-a šum₂-ma ina qar-a-bi x x x x x x ina UGU an-ni-i LUGAL {KUR}NIM.MA{KI} x x x x x x-ra {LU₂}na-si-ka-a-ni ša {URU}hu-pa-pa-ni {URU}pil-lat ina pa-ni-šu it-ta-al-ku-u-ni i-si-šu-nu i-du-bu-bu ma-a x x x i-ta-al-li LUGAL šu-nu x x x x x šu-tu-u₂-ni qar-a-bu x x x x x ma-a a-ta-a a-ni-ni x x x x x x-ni ina qar-a-bi la ni-il-lak x x x x x x-u₂-ni a-ni-ni i-si-šu x x x x x EN-si-šu na-am-mal na-am-mal x x x x x x {LU₂}NIGIR₂ i-sap-ra x x x x x ma-a ki-i ina UGU DUMU {1}dal-ta-a x x x x x x {LU₂}ERIM-MEŠ i-se-e-šu₂ x x x x x x x x x x x-il x x x x x x x x x x x+x-mu x x x x x x x x x x x-u₂ x x x x x x DUMU {1}dal-ta-a x x x x x x x ŠA₃-šu x x x x x x x ma-a šum₂-ma x x x x x x-tu₂ a-na GABA-šu₂ x x x x x x-tu₂ a-na GABA-šu₂-ma x x x x x x-hi šak-nu-u₂-ni x x x x x x-u-ni x x x x x x-il {ANŠE}KUR.RA-MEŠ x x x x x x-mu TA {1}um-ma-an-mi-na-a x x x x x qar-a-bi-ia a-na EN.NUN x x x x x ma-a a-na {LU₂}EN.NAM x x x x x {LU₂}ša-{GIŠ}a-ri-ti ša TA x x x x EN.NUN ša {URU}de-ri iṣ-ṣur-u₂-ni x x x x x x-u-ni mul-le-e-šu₂-nu x x x x x {LU₂}EN.NAM i-sap-ra ma-a x x x x-u-ti u₂-še-bal-ak-ka x x x x be-li₂ u₂-da URU ša₂-al-mu ki-i x x x x x x+x ina ŠA₃-bi qi-si x x x x x x x x {URU}HAL.ṢU ih-x+x x x x x x x x x x-me {LU₂}ku-x x x x x x x x x-šu₂-nu {1}{d}PA-x x x x x x x x x x ib ia aš₂ x x x x x x x x x u₂-ma-a ki-i ša₂ x x x x x x x x x x+x si x+x x x
